headline: Marriott Buys Lifestyle Brand citizenM, Sees Net Room Growth Boost
summary: Marriott International will pay $355 million for Netherlands-based hotel chain citizenM, which is expected to help lift Marriott's 2025 net rooms growth.

headline: Marriott International to Acquire the citizenM Brand
summary: Today, Marriott International (Nasdaq: MAR) announced it has reached an agreement to acquire the lifestyle brand citizenM, a unique and innovative offering in the select-service segment. The transaction is expected to accelerate Marriott's global expansion of its select-service and lifestyle lodging offerings, as the company continues to focus on expanding its portfolio to provide even more exciting options for guests and Marriott Bonvoy members around the world.

raw.headline: Marriott International to Acquire the citizenM Brand
raw.summary: Today, Marriott International (Nasdaq: MAR) announced it has reached an agreement to acquire the lifestyle brand citizenM, a unique and innovative offering in the select-service segment. The transaction is expected to accelerate Marriott's global expansion of its select-service and lifestyle lodging offerings, as the company continues to focus on expanding its portfolio to provide even more exciting options for guests and Marriott Bonvoy members around the world.

headline: Marriott International to acquire CitizenM for $355M
summary: The move is set to bolster Marriott’s global expansion in the select-service lifestyle segment, as 36 open hotels join the company’s portfolio.

raw.headline: Marriott International to acquire CitizenM for $355M
raw.summary: The move is set to bolster Marriott’s global expansion in the select-service lifestyle segment, as 36 open hotels join the company’s portfolio.
